featured.text: They have learned that damage of retina can cause blindness in zebrafish, yet it only takes about three to four weeks before vision is restored.
If the process can be replicated in humans, it may give rise to new treatments for blindness caused by retinal damage.

definition.en_def: The condition of being unable to see; lack of vision.
definition.example: His blindness did not stop him from pursuing his dreams.
